content: designed to be a cozy year round accompaniment this sweater hits that slightly oversized but perfect fit sweet spot i imagine this sweater to be something i reach for time and again something that holds so many memories and travels with me through the years this sweater is worked flat beginning at the front hem working upwards to shape the body shoulders neckline and then the back you will then pick up stitches to knit each sleeve and the neckband sides will be seamed at the end a free version of this pattern can be viewed on my blog 1 this sweater is designed in 9 sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x finished bust/chest circumference 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 70 this sweater is designed to be worn with 8-10 of positive ease model is 6 tall has a 33 bust and is wearing a size small with 9 of positive ease for best fit choose a size that is 8-10 larger than your corresponding bust measurement for example if your bust is 54 you would wear a size 3x materials 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 balls / 450 500 550 600 650 700 750 800 850 yards lion brand comfy cotton blend in whipped cream main color 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 balls / 450 500 550 600 650 700 750 800 850 yards lion brand comfy cotton blend in chai latte accent color size us 9 5 5 mm 32 or longer circular knitting needles size us 8 5 0 mm 32 or longer circular knitting needles size us 7 4 5 mm 24 circular knitting needles stitch markers tapestry needle to weave in ends note all yarn weights are approximate you may use more or less depending on your gauge and knitting style note on yarn comfy cotton blend is listed as a dk weight on ravelry but i would say is more of a worsted weight when deciding on a yarn substitution i would look for worsted weight yarns to obtain the gauge gauge 18 stitches and 24 row = 4 in stockinette stitch on size 9 needles this is an intermediate level knitting pattern this pattern is written in us english terms this pattern and photographs of this garment are property of kaitlin barthold of
